product_details_and_care:
A trim bag does triple-duty in the most stylish way possible, thanks to polished studs, a chic demi-lune silhouette and dual compartments.
Dual top zip closures
Optional chain crossbody strap; optional belt/strap
Two zip compartments with four interior card slots
Polyurethane
Imported
Item #5740379
product_size_info:
7"W x 7"H x ¼"D. (Interior capacity: extra-small.)
27" strap drop.
